mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGV_EVENT (EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_MAIN_IMAGE, EVENT_DETAIL_IMAGE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, CATEGORY_NO, USER_ID) VALUES (#{title}, #{mainImage}, #{detailImage}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{category.no}, #{user.id})
mapper.update:
UPDATE MGV_EVENT SET
EVENT_TITLE = #{title},
EVENT_MAIN_IMAGE = #{mainImage},
EVENT_DETAIL_IMAGE = #{detailImage},
EVENT_DELETED = #{deleted},
EVENT_START_DATE = #{startDate},
EVENT_END_DATE = #{endDate},
EVENT_UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate},
CATEGORY_NO = #{category.no}
WHERE EVENT_NO= #{no}
mapper.select:
select count(*) FROM MGV_EVENT A, MGV_EVENT_CATEGORIES B where A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO and A.EVENT_DELETED = 'N'
and A.CATEGORY_NO = #{catNo}
and A.EVENT_TITLE like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and A.EVENT_START_DATE > NOW()
and A.EVENT_START_DATE < NOW() and A.EVENT_END_DATE >= NOW()
and A.EVENT_END_DATE < NOW()

SELECT A.EVENT_NO as no, A.EVENT_TITLE as title, A.EVENT_MAIN_IMAGE as mainImage, A.EVENT_DETAIL_IMAGE as detailImage, A.EVENT_DELETED as deleted, A.EVENT_START_DATE as startDate, A.EVENT_END_DATE as endDate, A.EVENT_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, A.EVENT_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.CATEGORY_NO as "category.no", B.CATEGORY_NAME as "category.name" FROM MGV_EVENT A, MGV_EVENT_CATEGORIES B where A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO and A.EVENT_DELETED = 'N' and A.EVENT_NO = #{value}

SELECT A.EVENT_NO as no, A.EVENT_TITLE as title, A.EVENT_MAIN_IMAGE as mainImage, A.EVENT_DETAIL_IMAGE as detailImage, A.EVENT_DELETED as deleted, A.EVENT_START_DATE as startDate, A.EVENT_END_DATE as endDate, A.EVENT_UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, A.EVENT_CREATE_DATE as createDate, A.CATEGORY_NO as "category.no", B.CATEGORY_NAME as "category.name" FROM MGV_EVENT A, MGV_EVENT_CATEGORIES B where A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO and A.EVENT_DELETED = 'N'
and A.CATEGORY_NO = #{catNo}
and A.EVENT_TITLE like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and A.EVENT_START_DATE > NOW()
and A.EVENT_START_DATE < NOW() and A.EVENT_END_DATE >= NOW()
and A.EVENT_END_DATE < NOW()
order by A.EVENT_NO DESC
LIMIT #{end} OFFSET #{begin}
